movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: One WORD: disappointment!!!
review: I have read the other users comments: 'One word: GREAT'.  I said: What ??? Did they see 'Star Wars: A new hope'???  My word about Episode 1 is only one: disappointment!!!.   I pretend more from George Lucas: he waited 20 years.  Unfortunately the premises are contained in 'The return of ...': attract children mean attract money (merchandising...)

title: Only good entertainment
review: The only thing that could be said about Gladiator, the last Ridley Scott's movie, is good entertainment.  But is not far from the scheme of the classical American action movie: the male protagonist, his revenge to obtain, the final duel with the villain.  The initial scene of the night battle promised other and higher emotions...By the way I was born in Rome and I live in Rome and the ancient Rome of the movie is not a good representation.
